verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: pork chops] scalloped potatoes this is a wonderful dish my sister gave me the recipe as a casserole baked in the oven but i ’ve also fixed it in the slow cooker and on the stovetop everyone who has tasted it loves it here a homey meal that feels sunday - special —elizabeth johnston glendale arizona pork
